citations.narrative:
APHIS officials observed numerous fruit flies on and flying around the food provided for the toucan. Flies can contaminate
the food provided for this bird. The facility must provide wholesome and palatable food that is free of contamination for the
health of the toucan.
The diet for birds must be appropriate for the species, size, age, and condition of the bird. The food must be wholesome,
palatable to the birds, and free of contamination.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: Corrected at time of inspection on 5-28-24.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
JESSICA GOWINS, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.155(a) 
   
Feeding 
APHIS officials observed numerous fruit flies on and flying around the food provided for the toucan. Flies can contaminate 
the food provided for this bird. The facility must provide wholesome and palatable food that is free of contamination for the 
health of the toucan. 
 
The diet for birds must be appropriate for the species, size, age, and condition of the bird. The food must be wholesome, 
palatable to the birds, and free of contamination. 
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY: Corrected at time of inspection on 5-28-24. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
JESSICA GOWINS, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
